thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 44 of 2268
thread.title: Mrs Patrick

author: Mrs Patrick
title: Mrs Patrick
text: Another company that cannot organise their deliveries. I was told 5 times that the blinds were to be delivered, given tracking details, and time slots. Each time, the blinds failed to arrive. I organised for a fitter to come and each time had to a cancel him. He lost potential earnings, and I was left making yet more phone calls, both to the delivery company and Blinds2Go. Eventually, the blinds were recalled, and re-shipped. It is a case of sixth time lucky. never again! I
